title: OS Scheduler Simulation
summary: Multithreaded C simulation of FCFS, Round Robin, SRTF, and priority aging schedulers, used to compare latency and fairness under varying workloads.

title: Buffet Waste Tracking System
summary: Data collection and analysis system for tracking prepared vs leftover quantities in a buffet environment, enabling trend analysis and waste reduction.

title: Technical Indicator Backtesting Engine
summary: Implemented technical indicators and a backtesting framework using live market APIs, supporting walk-forward evaluation and basic risk metrics.

title: NBA Play-by-Play Data Pipeline
summary: Automated pipeline for scraping and structuring NBA play-by-play data at scale, designed for downstream player-level modeling and analysis.

title: Trading Log & Analysis Tool
summary: Lightweight web app for recording discretionary trades and post-trade analysis, with structured logs and performance summaries.
